00030     void test_read () {
00032         std::istringstream in("1 10\n");
00033         const bool b = read(in);
00034         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(b == true);
00035         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(i ==    1);
00036         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(j ==   10);}

00131     void test_swap() {
